Html:
I am using a proprietary database that can only be accessed through an API.  I have created an interface that translates the database data into a DataTable object.  I tried to set the ItemsSource property in code behind to the DataTable but it does not work.

 

Is there some way to populate the DataGrid in code behind?

Does something along these lines not work for you?

DataSet _customerDataSet = DBAccess.GetCustomers();
DataTable _customerDateTable = _customerDataSet.Tables["Customers"];
 DataGrid_Standard.ItemsSource = _customerDateTable.DefaultView;
It might be because ItemsSource is of type IEnumerable and DataTable is not. You could try using DataView (which is basically like our CollectionView) instead of DataTable.
I used a DataView object to populate the ItemsSource rather than a DataTable object and it works just fine.  Thanks for the help.
